abstract: Citigroup is drawing up lists of employees in a division including investment banking who will be let go in another round of layoffs, Reuters reported, citing people with direct knowledge of the matter.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup is drawing up lists of employees in a division including investment banking who will be let go in another round of layoffs, Reuters reported, citing people with direct knowledge of the matter.

headline.main: Ax to Fall Again at Citigroup, Report Says
